com.github.sanity4j.workflow

Class WorkUnitGroup

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.sanity4j.workflow.WorkUnitGroup
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WorkUnit, java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ToolRunnerGroup

    public class WorkUnitGroup
extends java.lang.Object
implements WorkUnit
    WorkUnitGroup provides a way to group WorkUnits.
    Since:
    Sanity4J 1.0
    Author:
    Yiannis Paschalidis

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      WorkUnitGroup(boolean allowConcurrent, java.lang.String description)
      Creates a WorkUnitGroup where parallel work unit execution is allowed.
      WorkUnitGroup(java.lang.String description)
      Creates a WorkUnitGroup where parallel work unit execution is disabled.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(WorkUnit workUnit)
      Adds a unit of work to this work group.
      java.lang.String getDescription()
      void run()
      Executes all the WorkUnits in this group.
      static void setMaxThreads(int maxThreads)
      Sets the maximum number of threads which are allowed globally for WorkUnitGroups.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • WorkUnitGroup

        public WorkUnitGroup(java.lang.String description)
        Creates a WorkUnitGroup where parallel work unit execution is disabled.
        Parameters:
        description - a short textual description of the WorkUnitGroup's purpose.

      • WorkUnitGroup

        public WorkUnitGroup(boolean allowConcurrent,
                     java.lang.String description)
        Creates a WorkUnitGroup where parallel work unit execution is allowed.
        Parameters:
        allowConcurrent - true if WorkUnits in this group can be executed in parallel, false if not.
        description - a short textual description of the WorkUnitGroup's purpose.

    • Method Detail

      • getDescription

        public java.lang.String getDescription()
        Specified by:
        getDescription in interface WorkUnit
        Returns:
        the description of this WorkUnit

      • run

        public void run()
        Executes all the WorkUnits in this group.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • add

        public void add(WorkUnit workUnit)
        Adds a unit of work to this work group.
        Parameters:
        workUnit - the work unit to add.

      • setMaxThreads

        public static final void setMaxThreads(int maxThreads)
        Sets the maximum number of threads which are allowed globally for WorkUnitGroups. This effectively controls how many WorkUnits can be run in parallel.
        Parameters:
        maxThreads - the maximum number of threads allowed.
